Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-10148 affecting package curl for versions less than 8.8.0-7
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-10148 affecting package curl for versions less than 8.8.0-7. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package curl is earlier than 8.8.0-7, affected by CVE-2025-10148
